USE electric_vehicle_ldw
GO

-- FILE FORMAT para la tabla de vehicle.csv
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'csv_file_format')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format
WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS (
            FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
            STRING_DELIMITER = '"',                --terminador de los campos de tipo string
            FIRST_ROW = 2,                         --datos a partir de la segunda fila
            USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,              --valor por defecto para datos null
            ENCODING = 'UTF8',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
        )
    );


--FILE FORMAT para la tabla de calendar.csv
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'csv_file_format_v2')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format_v2
WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS (
            FIELD_TERMINATOR = ';',
            STRING_DELIMITER = '"',                --terminador de los campos de tipo string
            FIRST_ROW = 2,                         --datos a partir de la segunda fila
            USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,              --valor por defecto para datos null
            ENCODING = 'UTF8',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
        )
    );


--FILE FORMAT para la tabla de location.csv
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'csv_file_format_v3')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format_v3
WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS (
            FIELD_TERMINATOR = ';',
            STRING_DELIMITER = '\',                --terminador de los campos de tipo string
            FIRST_ROW = 2,                         --datos a partir de la segunda fila
            USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,              --valor por defecto para datos null
            ENCODING = 'UTF8',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
        )
    );


--FILE FORMAT para la tabla de propietary.csv
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'tsv_file_format')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_file_format
WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS (
            FIELD_TERMINATOR = '\t',
            STRING_DELIMITER = '"',                --terminador de los campos de tipo string
            FIRST_ROW = 2,                         --datos a partir de la segunda fila
            USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,              --valor por defecto para datos null
            ENCODING = 'UTF8',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
        )
    );


--DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT vehicle_csv_format;


--FILE FORMAT para la tabla .parquet
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'parquet_file_format')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_file_format
WITH (
         FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
        DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
    );



--FILE FORMAT para la tabla .delta
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'delta_file_format')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT delta_file_format
WITH (
         FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA
    );
